field.name: NAME
field.value: Your blog has been added to friends

field.name: DESCRIPTION
field.value: #BLOG_ID# - Blog ID #BLOG_NAME# - Blog name #BLOG_URL# - Blog name, Latin letters only #BLOG_ADR# - Blog address #USER_ID# - User ID #USER# - User #USER_URL# - User URL #EMAIL_FROM# - Sender E-mail #EMAIL_TO# - Recipient E-mail
